price: 6. Diggah barak gimo aban salat kee qibaada sorkocobbaxa kaxxam raatissaah maxcô baxxaqqaa kee diggah aysuk raqta.
arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna nāshi-ata al-layli hiya ashaddu waṭan wa-aqwamu qīlan
